At the fortress, Tucson Prime gets Lord Perseus's message and responds.

"T=
his is Tucson Prime, I'm here with Night Shift, Rodimus, Dark Hawk, and Per=
ceptor.  We're in a bit of a bind, I've lost my visual capability and I'm w=
ithout my sonar equipment.  But I'm not completely helpless.  We need an es=
cape route but I can feel a down draft of air coming inside here..  Not sur=
e where it's from, I'm trying to determine that right now.  Will update you=
 soon, Tucson Prime Signing off."

Back at the Ark, on a stasis berth, a ti=
ny Autobot Femme begins to stirr from what appears to be quite a long nap. =
 She takes a deep breath in, and slowly opens her big blue optics.  She too=
, can hear Lord Perseus's voice and tries to reply as best she can.

"Lord =
Perseus....  Huh?  Wha?  I'm - in the Ark...  How'd - I get here?  Last thi=
ng - I remember ... Tucson..  Ohh no, Tucson!"

She tries to get to her fee=
t, and stumbles onto the floor on her knees.

"Gotta - find Tucson!  He - n=
eeds me."

She wanders out of the stasis quarters, and slowly makes her way=
 into the main lobby of the Ark, where she finds Lord Elder, and Elita.  Sh=
e can barely keep on her feet, and uses a door way to keep herself upright.=
  She quickly recognizes both Lord Elder and Elita and slowly shuffles over=
 to them, but realizes she is still in much need of recovery and Energon.  =
Her nap was long, and her legs had forgotten how to carry her.  She gets to=
 Lord Elder, and collapses to her knees once again.

"S'cuse me.  I'm sorry=
, I - was trying to - see if Tucson was here.  Last - thing I remember.. A =
- blast from behind, and then, nothing. I - heard a voice from Lord Perseus=
..  That's - what got me out of stasis. " 

Slowly she remembers what her l=
egs are for and stands up on them.

" Lord Elder, maybe you - know where Tu=
cson is.  I - gotta find him, make sure he's - in one piece, ya know?  Afte=
r all, he's kinda, sorta my big brother, can't abandon my only family membe=
r can I?"

Slowly she regains her perky personality.  She checks over her a=
rrows and forearm darts.

"And if I ever set eyes on any of those Decepticr=
eeps, I'm gonna do more than just shove a few arrows up their afts, I'll st=
ick a few up their afterburners too for good measure!"

Her eyes glow brigh=
t blue with recovered resentfulness toward the enemy.  

"Hmph, especially =
Scorponok, he deserves it the most. Oooh I hate that overgrown arachnid!"

=

 less repaired; they replaced the doors and

he defense systems and shields.

a shelf in the commander's office, he

vious maximal commander.

ed to maximal bands and picked

eus to all maximals and allies.    What is your status?"
